bibl.title: The Indian Gymnosophists as the Ideal Cynic Philosophers? A Cynic Diatribe in the Geneva Papyrus inv. 271.
Within the Circle of Ancient Ideas and Virtues. Studies in Honour of Professor Maria Dzielska.

bibl.seg: Andrzej Iwo Szoka, The Indian Gymnosophists as the Ideal Cynic Philosophers? A Cynic Diatribe in the Geneva Papyrus inv. 271.

Kamilla Twardowska, Maciej Salamon, Sławomir Sprawski, Michał Stachura & Sanisław Turlej (edd.), Within the Circle of Ancient Ideas and Virtues. Studies in Honour of Professor Maria Dzielska (Krakow, 2014) pp. 59-68.
